title: LDAP Update Name Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the `updateName` operation in the LDAP connector.

payload.description: Response for the `updateName` method. Indicates success or failure of the name update.

success.description: Indicates whether the LDAP name was successfully updated.

message.description: Optional message with additional details about the name update operation.

statusCode.description: HTTP-like status code representing the result of the operation (e.g., 200 for success, 400 for invalid input).

headers.description: Headers related to the operation response. May be empty for LDAP operations.
